name: repost-basic
title: Repost Basic
description: A basic button for repost content
showcaseDescription: Basic repost button with style variants. Clicking toggles repost state and displays repost count.

apiDocs.name: RepostButton
apiDocs.description: Basic repost button with automatic repost/unrepost behavior. When clicked without custom onclick handler, it toggles the repost state. Supports quote repost via dropdown menu.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (optional if available in context)

props.name: onclick
props.description: Optional custom click handler. If not provided, clicking will toggle repost state (repost/unrepost)

props.name: onquote
props.description: Optional handler for quote repost. When provided, shows a dropdown menu with 'Repost' and 'Quote' options

props.name: openDelay
props.description: Delay in milliseconds before opening dropdown menu

props.name: closeDelay
props.description: Delay in milliseconds before closing dropdown menu
